ContainerDoorclass

extras.t[998]

Superclass
Tree

Subclass
Tree

Global
Objects

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A ContainerDoor can be used as part of a multiply-containing object to represent the door of the container-like object defined on its remapIn property. A ContainerDoor is open or closed if the underlying container is open or closed, and remaps all container-appropriate actions to the remapIn object of its location. `class `**`ContainerDoor`**` :   `[`Fixture`](../object/Fixture.html)

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)

ContainerDoor

Properties  

cannotTakeMsgOVERRIDDEN

extras.t[1010]

*no description available*

isOpenOVERRIDDEN

extras.t[1000]

We're open if our location's container is open

remapInOVERRIDDEN

extras.t[1007]

Redirect all container-appropriate actions to the remapIn object of our location, so that opening, closing, locking and unlocking this door will perform the equivalent action on our container object.

Methods  

(none)
